source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_00<tab>Berthe, a local at the Mirror Planks, is looking for someone to retrieve her fishing rod from Lilystone.
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_00<tab>Am Spiegelsee-Steg vermisst Berthe ihre Angelrute.

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_01<tab>Berthe lost her rod at Lilystone when she threw it at a ghostly flame that suddenly appeared behind her. Head over to Lilystone and retrieve the well-worn fishing rod for the shaken Mirror Planks local.
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_01<tab>Als plötzlich unheimliche Flammen auf sie zuloderten, ließ Berthe ihre alte Angelrute am Lilienstein neben ihrem Zelt fallen. Hol ihre Angelrute für sie zurück.

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_02<tab>You have found the well-worn fishing rod. Return to the Mirror Planks and hand it back to Berthe.
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast Berthes Angelrute gefunden. Bringe sie ihr zum Spiegelsee-Steg.

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered the fishing rod to Berthe. The Elezen seems well acquainted with the normal denizens of the area, but has never before seen the likes of that strange, ghostly flame. Though thrilled to have her property returned, she wonders if she will ever attempt to fish at Lilystone again.
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_SEQ_03<tab>Was können das für seltsame Flammen gewesen sein? Berthe steckt der Schreck noch sichtlich in den Knochen, aber dank dir kann sie wieder angeln gehen.

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the well-worn fishing rod to Berthe at the Mirror Planks.
TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_1<tab>You seem a capable sort. Would you mind running over to Lilystone and retrieving my favorite fishing rod for me?
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_1<tab>Du siehst mutig und stark aus! Kannst du mir meine geliebte, alte Angelrute vom Lilienstein holen?

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_2<tab>I was happily dropping a line into the water, you see, when I suddenly noticed some ghostly sphere of fire bearing down upon me from behind. In a blind panic, I twisted around and flung my rod at the apparition before fleeing back here to the Planks.
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_2<tab>Als ich dort angelte, loderten plötzlich seltsame Flammen auf mich zu. Da packte mich die Furcht, ich ließ alles fallen und rannte um mein Leben.

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_3<tab>I dimly remember the rod passing straight through those unnatural flames and hitting the side of the tent I set up for afternoon naps. It's probably still there, but I can't bring myself to─ You'll go in my stead? Oh, thank you!
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_3<tab>Die Angelrute liegt hoffentlich noch neben dem Zelt. Kannst du sie holen? Bitte! Sie bedeutet mir sehr viel!

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_12<tab>Yes, this is it! Thank Nophica you came along─I just can't fish with anything else.
TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_13<tab>The vilekin and such around here pose no threat to me, but those flames... I've never seen the like.
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_13<tab>Ich war schon oft am Lilienstein angeln, aber solche Flammen hatte ich noch nie zuvor gesehen. Wirklich unheimlich war das!

source: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_14<tab>I wonder if I will ever build up the courage to fish at Lilystone again...
target: TEXT_SUBFST069_00385_BERTHE_000_14<tab>So schnell traue ich mich nicht mehr dorthin, aber dank dir kann ich jetzt woanders angeln.
